entry.title: Rain or Shine
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,128Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 9

Summary: ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been quite a few years since the Wayne Foundation was active, and just as long since it was helmed by an actual member of the Wayne family. What inspired the change? Is there a specific cause you‚Äôre hoping to champion?‚Äù At that, Bruce can‚Äôt help but let out a silent laugh, not as bitter as it might‚Äôve been in the past, but not entirely without sourness, either. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not looking to champion anything.‚Äù Kent only nods. Bruce shifts in his seat, forces himself to continue. ‚ÄúA few years ago, someone pointed out to me that I could be doing more for the city. I took that to heart.‚Äù A few years and a thousand lives. Enough time to teach him that money can still accomplish things justice alone cannot. ‚ÄúWho was it that‚Äî‚Äù ‚ÄúPass.‚Äù ‚ÄúPass?‚Äù For whatever reason, Clark looks amused. For even less¬†decipherable reasons, Bruce finds his reaction just as amusing in turn. ‚ÄúPass.‚Äù Bruce Wayne recognizes Clark Kent as Superman almost immediately upon meeting him. Clark takes a while to catch up.

entry.title: ‚ÄúIf the sky falls, will you catch it with me?‚Äù
entry.summary:
Author: acatcam

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 748Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: A crash in Smallville brings more than wreckage.It brings a detective with too many questions,a farm boy with too many secrets,and the slow realization that maybe saving the world isn‚Äôt something you do alone.He‚Äôs not yet Superman. He‚Äôs not yet Batman.Just Clark Kent, just Bruce Wayne‚Äîtwo boys caught between who they are and who they have to become.But the closer Bruce looks, the less Smallville makes sense.And the closer Clark gets, the harder it is to let go.How did a wreckage lead to this?

entry.title: Safe And Sound
entry.summary:
Author: Boltbot

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,743Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 917

Summary: Bruce opened his eyes.A red cape rippled in the wind above him. A gold symbol‚Äîbold, and bright‚Äîstood out against the deep blue of a suit that barely seemed real.And then the face. Calm, focused, and unabashedly kind.Superman.‚ÄúYou alright?‚Äù the hero asked, voice deep and sure, like the world wasn‚Äôt ending around them.Bruce blinked, not sure what surprised him more‚Äîthe fact that he was alive, or the man who‚Äôd made sure of it.‚ÄúI-I am now,‚Äù he muttered, mind still scrambling after the fall.Superman‚Äôs smile was subtle, but real. ‚ÄúYou know, I never get tired of hearing that.‚ÄùAnd just like that, Bruce Wayne‚Äîwho‚Äôd accepted death‚Äîwas held in the arms of something he didn‚Äôt believe in.Hope.¬†‚™ª‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄñ§ì‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚™º¬†Billionaire Bruce Wayne reluctantly attends a charity gala in Metropolis to represent Wayne Enterprises and support the city‚Äôs post-crisis recovery. entry.title: A touch too close
entry.summary:
Author: sorumii

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,118Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 18

Summary: Clark was doing his best to respect Batman‚Äôs boundaries and stay out of Gotham, just like he‚Äôd been asked. But something kept pulling him toward the quiet vigilante. There was an ache in his chest, an unshakable urge to understand him: his motivations, his past, and, if Clark dared to be too hopeful, uncover his identity.But what happens when circumstances force them closer in a way Clark never expected? A hostage situation takes a strange turn when they‚Äôre trapped in a cloud of mysterious gas, one that strips away control and unleashes instincts they‚Äôd never dare to act on if not pushed to the edge....In which Clark and Bruce are exposed to sex pollen and find it impossible to resist their deepest, most primal urges.

entry.title: Gotham's Guide to Marinette Dupain-Cheng's Unintentional Matchmaking Pyramid Scheme
entry.summary:
Author: Apathetic_Witch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,276Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 68

Summary: "-I have officers on the way, but ma'am, I'm going to have you stay on the line with me while we wait for them to arrive on scene-""Nope! Listen, I have a train filled to the absolute brim with Coca-Cola rushing hundreds of kilometers per hour towards a stationary train packed with Mentos. I am NOT missing this." And then, the woman promptly hung up. Raziela typed that last quote in her updated notes, specifying that she was not sure if it was hyperbole.---DISCLAIMER: If you haven't read the first and second parts of this series, this fic will make little to no sense!For those of you who HAVE read I,C,&tWoRT and M,M,&tSDoM, HI HELLO I'M STILL ALIVE I PROMISE!!! entry.title: Like Sunshine After Rain
entry.summary:
Author: vela (volamena)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,089Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 72

Summary: Bruce‚Äôs fingers shift around Clark's bicep as if feeling for something. Clark watches as a myriad of emotions flutter through Bruce‚Äôs eyes, from suspicion to surprise to concern to suspicion again. Clark doesn‚Äôt know what to make of that. Did Bruce Wayne just‚Ä¶feel him up?‚ÄúEr, Mr. Wayne?‚ÄùBruce retracts his hand like he's been burned. He shifts back into position, as if returning to his baseline state after mentally filing away some information. ‚ÄúI apologize, Mr. Kent. Thank you for your time today. Alfred will escort you out. Please have a safe trip back to Metropolis.‚ÄùNow it‚Äôs Clark‚Äôs turn to stare at him. ‚ÄúUh‚Ä¶right. Have a good night, Mr. Wayne.‚Äù Bruce just stares back.Yeah, Clark decides, Bruce Wayne is weird.
